languages.text: "Искоренение инфекции имеет наивысший приоритет, но полная эрадикация мануфакторума-очага нанесет тяжкий урон ресурсной базе. Данная единица... Я могу предложить иной метод очищения. Однако таинства Омнисии, доступные мне, не могут быть разглашены мирянам. Прошу довериться мне".

"The eradication of the infection is the highest priority, but to completely eradicate the manufactorum serving as the epicentre is to inflict serious damage to the resource supply. This unit... I can propose another method of purging. However, the sacraments of the Omnissiah that are available to me cannot be revealed to the laity. I ask that you place your trust in me."
languages.original_text: "Искоренение инфекции имеет наивысший приоритет, но полная эрадикация мануфакторума-очага нанесет тяжкий урон ресурсной базе. Данная единица... Я могу предложить иной метод очищения. Однако таинства Омнисии, доступные мне, не могут быть разглашены мирянам. Прошу довериться мне".

traits.locale_text: "Eradicating the infection is our highest priority, but to completely eradicate the-manufactorum epicentre would mean inflicting serious damage to the resource base. This unit... I can propose another method of purging. However, the sacraments of the Omnissiah that are available to me cannot be revealed to the laity. I ask you to put your trust in me."

I can propose another method of purging. However, the sacraments of the Omnissiah that are available to me cannot be revealed to the laity. I ask that you place your trust in me."

languages.text: “根除感染是我们的首要任务，但感染的源头是制造工厂。如果将其彻底摧毁，恐怕会对我们的资源供应造成严重破坏。本单位……我可以提出另一种净化方法。但是，我所用的欧姆尼塞亚圣礼不能展示给教外人士，我只能请求你信任我。”
languages.original_text: "The eradication of the infection is the highest priority, but to completely eradicate the manufactorum serving as the epicentre is to inflict serious damage to the resource supply. This unit... I can propose another method of purging. However, the sacraments of the Omnissiah that are available to me cannot be revealed to the laity. I ask that you place your trust in me."

traits.locale_text: “根除感染是我们的首要任务，但感染的源头是制造工厂。如果将其彻底摧毁，恐怕会对我们的资源供应造成严重破坏。本单位……我可以提出另一种净化方法。但是，我所用的欧姆尼塞亚圣礼不能展示给教外人士，我只能请求你信任我。”
“根除感染是我们的首要任务，但彻底摧毁制造工厂会对我们的资源供应造成严重破坏。本单位……我可以提出另一种净化方法。但是，我所用的欧姆尼塞亚圣礼不能展示给教外人士，我只能请求你信任我。”

languages.text: «Erradicar la infección es nuestra máxima prioridad, pero arrasar por completo el epicentro del manufactorum supondría graves daños a nuestro suministro de recursos. Esta unidad... Yo puedo proponer otro método de purga. Sin embargo, los sacramentos del Omnissiah que están a mi disposición no pueden ser revelados a los laicos. Debo pedirle que confíe en mí».
languages.original_text: "The eradication of the infection is the highest priority, but to completely eradicate the manufactorum serving as the epicentre is to inflict serious damage to the resource supply. This unit... I can propose another method of purging. However, the sacraments of the Omnissiah that are available to me cannot be revealed to the laity. I ask that you place your trust in me."

traits.locale_text: «Erradicar la infección es nuestra máxima prioridad, pero arrasar por completo el epicentro del manufactorum supondría graves daños a nuestro suministro de recursos. Esta unidad... Yo puedo proponer otro método de purga. Sin embargo, los sacramentos del Omnissiah que están a mi disposición no pueden ser revelados a los laicos. Debo pedirle que confíe en mí».

languages.text: 「感染を根絶することが最優先ですが、聖工場の震央を完全に根絶することは、我々の資源供給に深刻なダメージを与えることになります。このユニットは...別の粛清方法を提案できそうです。ただ、私が利用できる万機神の聖餐は、一般信者には明かすことができません。どうか私を信頼してください」
languages.original_text: "The eradication of the infection is the highest priority, but to completely eradicate the manufactorum serving as the epicentre is to inflict serious damage to the resource supply. This unit... I can propose another method of purging. However, the sacraments of the Omnissiah that are available to me cannot be revealed to the laity. I ask that you place your trust in me."

traits.locale_text: 「感染を根絶することが最優先ですが、聖工場の震央を完全に根絶することは、我々の資源供給に深刻なダメージを与えることになります。このユニットは...別の粛清方法を提案できそうです。ただ、私が利用できる万機神の聖餐は、一般信者には明かすことができません。どうか私を信頼してください」
「感染を根絶することが最優先ですが、聖工場の震央を完全に根絶することは、我々の資源供給に深刻なダメージを与えることになります。このユニットは...別の粛清方法を提案できそうです。ただ、私が利用できる万機神の聖餐は、一般信者には明かすことができません。どうか私を信頼してください」

languages.text: « L'éradication de l'infection est notre priorité absolue, mais la purge complète du manufactorum qui en est l'épicentre nuirait gravement à notre approvisionnement en ressources. Cette unité... Je peux proposer une autre méthode d'épuration. Toutefois, je ne peux révéler aux profanes le détail des saints sacrements de l'Omnimessie dont je suis dépositaire. Je vous demande humblement de me faire confiance. »
languages.original_text: "The eradication of the infection is the highest priority, but to completely eradicate the manufactorum serving as the epicentre is to inflict serious damage to the resource supply. This unit... I can propose another method of purging. However, the sacraments of the Omnissiah that are available to me cannot be revealed to the laity. I ask that you place your trust in me."

traits.locale_text: « L'éradication de l'infection est notre priorité absolue, mais la purge complète du manufactorum qui en est l'épicentre nuirait gravement à notre approvisionnement en ressources. Cette unité... Je peux proposer une autre méthode d'épuration. Toutefois, je ne peux révéler aux profanes le détail des saints sacrements de l'Omnimessie dont je suis dépositaire. Je vous demande humblement de me faire confiance. »

languages.text: "Die Bekämpfung der Infektion hat oberste Priorität, aber wenn wir das Manufactorum, in dem sich das Epizentrum befindet, vollständig vernichten, hätte dies ernsthafte Konsequenzen für unsere Versorgung mit Ressourcen. Diese Einheit ... Ich kann eine andere Methode der Läuterung vorschlagen. Doch die Sakramente des Omnissiah, die mir zur Verfügung stehen, dürfen dem Laienstand nicht offenbart werden. Ich bitte Euch, mir einfach zu vertrauen."
languages.original_text: "The eradication of the infection is the highest priority, but to completely eradicate the manufactorum serving as the epicentre is to inflict serious damage to the resource supply. This unit... I can propose another method of purging. However, the sacraments of the Omnissiah that are available to me cannot be revealed to the laity. I ask that you place your trust in me."

traits.locale_text: "Die Bekämpfung der Infektion hat oberste Priorität, aber wenn wir das Manufactorum, in dem sich das Epizentrum befindet, vollständig vernichten, hätte dies ernsthafte Konsequenzen für unsere Versorgung mit Ressourcen. Diese Einheit ... Ich kann eine andere Methode der Läuterung vorschlagen. Doch die Sakramente des Omnissiah, die mir zur Verfügung stehen, dürfen dem Laienstand nicht offenbart werden. Ich bitte Euch, mir einfach zu vertrauen."

"Die Infektion auszulöschen, ist unsere oberste Priorität, ja. Doch wenn wir das Manufactorum, in dem sich das Epizentrum befindet, vollständig vernichten, würde das unsere Lieferkette schwer beeinträchtigen. Diese Einheit ... Ich kann eine andere Methode der Läuterung vorschlagen. Doch die Sakramente des Omnissiah, die mir zur Verfügung stehen, dürfen dem Laienstand nicht offenbart werden. Ich bitte Euch, mir einfach zu vertrauen."

languages.text: "Salgının kökünün kurutulması en büyük önceliğimiz olsa da hastalığın çıkış noktası olan manufaktorumu tümüyle yok etmek, kaynaklarımıza okkalı bir darbe vuracaktır. Bu birim... Yani ben, arındırma işlemi için farklı bir yol öneriyorum. Fakat Hermesih'in bana bahşettiği kutsal bilgiler, ruhban olmayanlarla paylaşılamaz. Bana güvenmenizi rica ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "The eradication of the infection is the highest priority, but to completely eradicate the manufactorum serving as the epicentre is to inflict serious damage to the resource supply. This unit... I can propose another method of purging. However, the sacraments of the Omnissiah that are available to me cannot be revealed to the laity. I ask that you place your trust in me."

traits.locale_text: "Salgının kökünün kurutulması en büyük önceliğimiz olsa da hastalığın çıkış noktası olan manufaktorumu tümüyle yok etmek, kaynaklarımıza okkalı bir darbe vuracaktır. Bu birim... Yani ben, arındırma işlemi için farklı bir yol öneriyorum. Fakat Hermesih'in bana bahşettiği kutsal bilgiler, ruhban olmayanlarla paylaşılamaz. Bana güvenmenizi rica ediyorum."
